Trade/Device Name(s): Roche Diagnostics pH electrode on the OMNI Modular, C and S Analyzers
OMNI Modular, OMNI C and OMNI S Analyzer (pH Electrode)
Regulation Name(s): Blood gases (Pco2, Po2) and blood pH test system
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Electrode measurement of hydrogen ion concentration
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche Diagnostics pH electrode on OMNI Modular, C and S Analyzers for measurement of pH in pleural fluid
Indications for Use Summary: Used for measurement of pH in pleural fluid to aid management of patients with parapneumonic effusions, ensuring specimens are clear of debris
